getChannel(uint256).details: Gets the address of a channel in the registry.

params.id: The type of channel to get.

getChannels().details: Gets the address of the channels in the registry.

registerChannel(address).details: Register a new channel and registers it in the registry.

params.channelAddr: The address of the channel to register.

sendMessage(uint256,bytes).details: send a message a channel in the registry.

params._channelId: The address of the channel to register.
